subject: Olympic Games (2024)
lead_paragraph: If a referendum on continuing Boston’s candidacy for the 2024 Olympics fails, it will be a huge blow to its backers and another blow to the U.S.O.C.’s effort to bring back the Games.
snippet: If a referendum on continuing Boston’s candidacy for the 2024 Olympics fails, it will be a huge blow to its backers and another blow to the U.S.O.C.’s effort to bring back the Games.
